activity.title: ohcnetwork/care_fe#12152
activity.text: @nihal467 I have successfully identified the issue. **Here’s the current bug:** **And here’s the fixed view after my solution:** **My solution:** - I will update the button layout to use a responsive flex-wrap structure instead of the current grid, ensuring proper wrapping and spacing on smaller screens without breaking desktop layouts. - The fix will be minimal, clean, and maintain design consistency. **Expected Timeline:** I will raise the PR today i.e. 29 April. **Additional Context:** After the fix, the buttons will wrap properly on smaller screens instead of overflowing or squishing. The layout stays clean and user-friendly across all devices.

activity.title: ohcnetwork/care_fe#11346
activity.text:
I would like to take on this issue as I have navigated the issue and the issue lies in the zod form schema. 

Solution:
I will update the .refine method in formSchema to correctly merge valid_from with start_time and valid_to with end_time for accurate isBefore comparisons. This will be done by extracting hours and minutes from the time string using .split(':') and applying .setHours(). The fix will ensure proper handling of both same-day and multi-day cases

Expected Time : 
I have fixed the issue already.
